NYC: Today is a Special Election Day for public advocate!

Polls close at 9pm. 

That’s more than enough time to read up on the race on the train ride home and swing by your polling place on the way.

Learn more about the race here: https://pix11.com/2019/02/25/heres-what-you-need-to-know-before-you-vote-in-tuesdays-special-election-for-public-advocate/amp/

RT @RepKatiePorter Today, I brought the receipts. https://twitter.com/RealBankReform/status/1100457049207521281 QT @RealBankReform .@RepKatiePorter to Equifax CEO: "if you agree that exposing information like what exists in your credit reports creates harm...WHY are your lawyers arguing in federal court that there was no injury & no harm created by your data breach?" http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1100456371726766080/pu/img/LbWX7oI9zaNo7KSN.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1100456371726766080/pu/vid/268x180/M3s0s18Mw6ARbltj.mp4?tag=6

As President, my first priority would be to lift up middle-class families. Almost half of Americans don’t have enough cash to cover a $400 emergency, like a broken car or an unexpected medical expense. That’s wrong. Passing the LIFT Act will alleviate that burden.

Thanks to the @KYFB for a great Q&A today! I look forward to continuing my work on the issues we discussed and promise to keep advocating for Kentucky’s farmers in Congress. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D0XLUsoXQAANzr5.jpg

😂😂😂 https://twitter.com/jordanuhl/status/1081264515994583041 QT @JordanUhl "welcome back to nra tv. today's topic: ocasio. don't you just hate her? everything about her. don't you just hate the way her hair looks silky smooth, and how great she smells and when you're laying awake every night thinking about how you want to ask her out?! she sucks!"

We must follow cities and states across the country and raise the federal minimum wage to $15 an hour and index it to median wage growth thereafter. Doing so would give more than 40 million low-wage workers a raise, more than 25 percent of the U.S. workforce.

RT @RepGallagher Proud to introduce legislation with @SenTedCruz and @SenTomCotton to recognize Israeli sovereignty over the Golan Heights. With threats from Russia and Iran growing inside Syria, it's more important than ever to ensure our ally Israel has defensible borders. https://twitter.com/SenTedCruz/status/1100534896068620288 QT @SenTedCruz Today @SenTomCotton, @RepGallagher & I today introduced companion bills establishing that it shall be the policy of the United States to recognize Israel’s sovereignty over the Golan Heights. --> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=4334

RT @rubinafillion Though @AOC, @SenWarren, and @SenSanders are portrayed as “leftist” candidates, their positions align with most Americans’:

60% support free college initiatives.
70% support a single-payer universal health care system.
61% back stricter gun control laws.
https://theintercept.com/2019/02/26/democratic-party-centrism-aoc-sanders-warren/

Americans are sick and tired of corporate America and their wealthy CEOs ripping off working families. I'm proud to stand with the locomotive manufacturing workers of @ueunion Local 506 and 618 in their fight against GE/Wabtec to maintain decent wages and working conditions. https://twitter.com/ueunion/status/1100367854485102592 QT @ueunion UE Locals 506 and 618 worked long into Tuesday morning and were not able to convince the company to negotiate an acceptable short term agreement that preserves the wages, benefits, and working conditions of GE/Wabtec employees. https://www.erienewsnow.com/story/40025482/update-union-says-they-are-left-with-no-choice-but-to-go-on-strike

We must never forget the heroes of 9/11. 

I'm fighting to make sure Congress permanently renews the Victim Compensation Fund so that the brave first responders during 9/11 can afford quality healthcare they need and deserve.  #Renew911VCF

Bayard Rustin was a leading organizer of the 1963 March on Washington. Openly gay, he never achieved the widespread recognition he deserved. Listen to him explain why he fought so hard for the rights of marginalized communities. #BlackHistoryMonth https://www.npr.org/2019/01/06/682598649/in-newly-found-audio-a-forgotten-civil-rights-leader-says-coming-out-was-an-abso
No person should have to work more than one full-time job to put food on the table or pay the bills. Period.

Tonight a dude was creepily (and obviously) taking a picture of me while pretending he wasn’t and I had to break his imaginary fourth wall and say “Hi! I’m a person! This is weird!” https://twitter.com/chriscjackson/status/1100601742562152454 QT @ChrisCJackson Conservatives out here taking pictures of @AOC having dinner and walking down the hallway. They are so obsessed.

Poet Audre Lorde dedicated her life to speaking about the injustices that plague our nation: everything from racism, sexism, to homophobia. Her powerful words remind us that we need to speak out about these, even when others are silent. #BlackHistoryMonth http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/D0XWJOnWoAM5p0W.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/D0XWJOnWoAM5p0W.mp4

I will vote for the resolution to block the President’s national emergency declaration. We don’t need a wall, we need to address actual emergencies facing our nation — everything from climate change, to gun violence, to lack of access to health care.
https://twitter.com/newshour/status/1100540137598058496 QT @NewsHour NEWS: The House has passed a resolution to block President Trump's emergency declaration for a wall on the southern border. 

The vote was 245-182. The measure now goes to the Senate.

Congratulations to @DrNealDunnFL2  on passage of his bill to support STEM for veterans. I have filed the companion bill in the Senate & am working to pass it & send to the President for his signature. https://www.wcjb.com/content/news/House-Bill-to-support-STEM-for-veterans-passes-506368901.html 
#Sayfie

I applaud my House colleagues for voting to overturn the president’s efforts to declare a fake emergency & circumvent Congress to jam through his border wall. I urge my Senate colleagues to pass this measure to make it clear that the American people will not pay for this wall.

The number of military defectors from the #Venezuela military keeps climbing. 

In the last 18 hours another 100 have abandoned the regime & a total of 326 have now crossed into #Colombia.

Maduro uses masked thugs to unleash terror in #Venezuela

As a person who actually worked for tips & hourly wages in my life, instead of having to learn about it 2nd-hand, I can tell you that most people want to be paid enough to live.

A living wage isn’t a gift, it’s a right. Workers are often paid far less than the value they create. https://twitter.com/axios/status/1100283779703173121 QT @axios Ivanka Trump goes after Ocasio-Cortez policies in Fox News Interview: "People want to work for what they get. So, I think that this idea of a guaranteed minimum is not something most people want." 
https://www.axios.com/ivanka-trump-challenges-ocasio-cortez-1551157745-5ef1546e-598a-4f34-bb92-7a882f28553b.html?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=onhrs http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D0T-QK6UcAAd-FB.jpg

Rather than engage @HawleyMO arguments the @WSJopinion decides to take ad hominem cheap shots instead. The @WSJ produces great journalism & commentary.  But its editorial board is increasingly attacks people instead of debating against ideas or policies.

I voted NO today on Eric Miller’s nomination to the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals & will vote no on every nominee to an appellate court until we have a fair process in place. Home-state senators must be allowed to do their due diligence & consent to nominees.

Robby, I know you will build upon successes already made, work to expand our Majority and ensure voters hear about what House Democrats are doing to build a stronger America for the people. -NP https://twitter.com/RobbyMook/status/1100553748760408065 QT @RobbyMook Excited about this next adventure to protect & expand the Democratic majority.  @TeamPelosi has already shown the difference strong Democratic leadership makes and there's no team I'd rather be fighting for right now.  Let's go build on last year's wins! https://twitter.com/apalmerdc/status/1100456910522929153

I'm running for president because we need real criminal justice reform. It’s an international disgrace that we have more people in jail than any other country—disproportionately Black, Latino and Native American.

BREAKING: The House just voted overwhelmingly to put an end to Trump's #FakeEmergency. It's time for the Senate to follow suit! It's time to put country over party. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D0XmTnHX0AAm7fH.png

My friend @PattyMurray has spent decades fighting for our youngest kids. Because you:
- shared your stories
- brought your children to Capitol Hill to meet w/ lawmakers 
- never gave up

We brought our nation’s child care crisis to the forefront of the national conversation. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D0WHnMtX0Ac6YuL.jpg

100% on point.

It’s been seven years since we unjustly lost Trayvon Martin. His tragic death was not just a moment in history — it sparked a movement and his legacy continues to live through our fight for justice. We must be better than this.

It’s outrageous that hundreds of immigrant families are still being separated at the border. My colleagues and I reintroduced the REUNITE Act, requiring immediate family reunification of children who can be safely reunified. This human rights violation must come to an end now.

#Venezuela military members keep abandoning the #MaduroRegime. Now over 400 have switched sides.

This solider details how they are forced to work with  armed “Colectivos” gangs who murder civilians & who get to sleep in beds while soldiers are forced to sleep on the ground. https://twitter.com/ntn24ve/status/1100538502150795265 QT @NTN24ve [#VIDEO] El crudo testimonio de un Guardia Nacional que logró pasar por la trocha a Colombia http://www.ntn24america.com/america-latina/venezuela/bernal-dice-que-guardias-que-desertaron-atropellaron-dos-personas-en-la

So great to see so many familiar faces at the @KYFB breakfast in Washington this morning. I’m proud to fight for Kentucky’s farmers and agriculture industry! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D0VZISFX0AEPXQk.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D0VZISGX0AE7fwA.jpg

Today I re-introduced the REUNITE Act, a bill that would:
-ensure that immigrant families who can be safely reunited are immediately brought back together,
-improve systems for family reunifications,
-and provide humane alternatives to detention. 
It's just the right thing to do.

I’m running my campaign on the principle of equal access for anyone who joins it. No fancy receptions or big money fundraisers. Just donate what you can, when you can. And if you get a call from an unknown number, pick up: Because it just might be me calling to say thank you. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D0XwiTrX0AIEPBr.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1100548747040309249/vid/320x320/7H9tbrUSrm2GnVag.mp4?tag=9

We spend almost twice as much per capita on health care as any nation, yet our health outcomes are worse and life expectancy is in decline. How does that make any sense?

It is time for us to join every other major country and guarantee health care to all people as a right.
